meanings: fragment, chip, splinter, debris, (폭발로 인한) shrapnel, (유리·금속 등의) shard

vlive.korean: 승관이가 모기를 잡았는데 그 파편이... Seungkwan hit a mosquito and the pieces of it... 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN RADIO] 캐럿들 귀대귀대#31
vlive.english: Seungkwan hit a mosquito and the pieces of it...

vlive.korean: 파편이 제가 이제 별명입니다. - 그래그래 Memory 을 작곡한 파편. Fragment is my nickname. - The person who wrote "Memory". 듣기 View video Happy Robot Records : 소란 작업중
vlive.english: Fragment is my nickname. - The person who wrote "Memory".

vlive.korean: 저는 그때 그 상처, 꽂혀있는 유리 파편이랑 상처를 보고... When I saw his scar, the scattered glass and his wound... 듣기 View video V MOVIE : 이병헌+강동원+김우빈 <마스터> 무비토크 라이브 ' Movie Talk Live'
vlive.english: When I saw his scar, the scattered glass and his wound...

vlive.korean: 깨진 충격에 의해 힘의 원인이 된 곳으로도 파편이 날아가거든. The glass splinters fly to the direction where it was thrown. 듣기 View video 컨버전스 TV (CONS TV) : [악동탐정스 Part 3] 제1화. 황제지보 도난사건Ⅰ
vlive.english: The glass splinters fly to the direction where it was thrown.

vlive.korean: 이건 변경가능성이 많으니까. - Instagram 보시는분들은 파편이 뭔지 아세요? This has high possibility of changing. - Do guys know Fragment? 듣기 View video Happy Robot Records : 소란 작업중
vlive.english: This has high possibility of changing. - Do guys know Fragment?

examples.korean: Falling debris rained on us from above. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 위에서 낙하하는 파편들이 우리에게 비처럼 쏟아졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Falling debris rained on us from above. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: A tiny fraction was found in her house. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀의 집에서 작은 파편이 발견되었다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: A tiny fraction was found in her house. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Be careful not to step on any fragments. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 파편을 밟지 않도록 조심해라. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: Be careful not to step on any fragments. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Shards of (broken) glass still remain on the ground. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 유리 파편이 아직도 바닥에 남아 있다 Neungyule
examples.english: Shards of (broken) glass still remain on the ground. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Tiny pieces of shrapnel were delicately removed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 정교한 솜씨로 작은 파편들이 제거되었다. Neungyule
examples.english: Tiny pieces of shrapnel were delicately removed. Add to Wordbook
